summary: This document is an email from Lesley Groff to Paul Morris regarding a potential meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. It indicates a request for Paul to visit Jeffrey on February 28, 2013.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff sent an email to Paul Morris on February 21, 2013.
The email discusses a potential meeting with Jeffrey Epstein on February 28, 2013.
The communication is marked as confidential.
